redshift.sql:
DROP TABLE if exists public.svropor;
                CREATE TABLE public.svropor(   
                  PROGRAM_CODE varchar(4),  
                  TERM_CODE varchar(6),  
                  SEMESTER varchar(3), 
                  DOM_INT varchar(4), 
                  DAY1 smallint,
                  OFFERS smallint,
                  ACCEPTANCE smallint,
                  PRIMARY KEY (PROGRAM_CODE, TERM_CODE, SEMESTER, DOM_INT)
                )
                SORTKEY(TERM_CODE, PROGRAM_CODE, SEMESTER)
                ;
                COPY public.svropor FROM 's3://gbc-analytics-staging-devl/application/svropor_banner/svropor_banner.csv'
                credentials 'aws_access_key_id={access_key_id};aws_secret_access_key={secret_access_key}'
                delimiter ',' region 'ca-central-1' csv IGNOREHEADER 1;                
                commit;
